summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3045, for the improvement of West Hallday Street and West Halladay Street produced, from Eighth Avenue West to a point twenty-nine (29) feet east of Sixth Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36709 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
